val:
directive @cacheControl(maxAge: Int, scope: CacheControlScope) on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT | INTERFACE

type Admin {
  _id: ID!
  full_name: String!
  email: String!
  is_super_admin: Boolean
  is_admin: Boolean
  createdAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
}

type Attributes {
  name: String
  description: String
  duration: Int
  slug: String
  color: String
  active: Boolean
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime
  url: String
}

type BankDetails {
  account_holders_name: String
  bank_name: String
  account_number: String
}

type BlogUser {
  _id: ID!
  f_name: String!
  l_name: String!
  email: String!
  password: String!
  is_super_admin: Boolean
  is_admin: Boolean
  created_posts: [Post!]
  no_of_posts: Int
  createdAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
}

type BlogUserConnection {
  edges: [BlogUser!]
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

enum CacheControlScope {
  PUBLIC
  PRIVATE
}

type Calendly {
  type: String
  id: ID
  attributes: Attributes
}

type Client {
  _id: ID!
  full_name: String!
  email: String!
  company_name: String!
  company_website: String
  company_logo: String
  phone_number: String
  is_client: Boolean
  employees: [Job!]
  requests: [ClientRequest!]
  createdAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
}

type ClientConnection {
  edges: [Client!]!
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

type ClientRequest {
  _id: ID!
  request_status: String
  description: String
  role: String
  suggested_professionals: [Professional!]
  interviewed_professionals: [Professional!]
  interested_hires: [Professional!]
  client: Client
  employees: [Job!]
  createdAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
}

type ClientRequestConnection {
  edges: [ClientRequest!]!
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

"""
A date-time string at UTC, such as 2007-12-03T10:15:30Z, compliant with the
`date-time` format outlined in section 5.6 of the RFC 3339 profile of the ISO
8601 standard for representation of dates and times using the Gregorian calendar.
"""
scalar DateTime

type Education {
  _id: ID!
  education_type: String!
  institution: String!
  year_of_graduation: String!
  professional: Professional
}

type Job {
  _id: ID!
  role: String!
  description: String!
  duration: String
  salary: String
  professional: Professional
  request: ClientRequest
}

type JobConnection {
  edges: [Job!]!
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

type Mutation {
  create_super_admin(full_name: String!, email: String!, password: String): Status
  client_signup(full_name: String!, email: String!, password: String, company_name: String!, role: String, description: String!): Status
  new_client_request(role: String, description: String!): Status
  update_client_profile(company_website: String, file: Upload, phone_number: String): Status
  professional_signup(full_name: String!, email: String!, phone_number: String!, password: String!): Status
  update_professional_profile(file: Upload, address: String, state: String, city: String, category: String, about: String, employment_type: String, preffered_work_style: String): Status
  update_professional_skillset(skill: String!, years_of_experience: String!): Status
  update_professional_bankdetails(account_holders_name: String, bank_name: String, account_number: String): Status
  delete_skill_set(skillsetId: ID!): Status
  update_professional_workhistory(job_title: String, job_description: String, start_date: String, end_date: String, name_of_company: String, company_location: String, employment_type: String): Status
  delete_work_history(workhistoryId: ID!): Status
  update_professional_portfolio(personal_website: String, linkedin_profile: String, github_profile: String, dribble_profile: String, behance: String, facebook_profile: String, instagram_profile: String, twitter_profile: String): Status
  update_professional_project(project_title: String, project_description: String, link_to_repository: String, link_to_project: String, technologies_used: [String]): Status
  delete_project(projectId: ID!): Status
  assign_professional_task(title: String!, instructions: String!, submission_date: DateTime, professionalId: ID!): Status
  submit_task(link_to_project: String, link_to_repo: String, taskId: ID!): Status
  score_professional_task(submittedTaskId: ID!, score: Int): Status
  update_professional_education(education_type: String!, institution: String!, year_of_graduation: String!): Status
  pass_professional(professionalId: ID!, salary_range: String!, experience_level: String!): Status
  fail_professional(professionalId: ID!): Status
  suggest_professionals(professionalId: [ID!], clientRequestId: ID!): Status
  remove_suggested_professionals(professionalId: [ID!], clientRequestId: ID!): Status
  choose_prof_interview(professionalId: [ID!], clientRequestId: ID!): Status
  choose_prof_hire(professionalId: [ID!], clientRequestId: ID!): Status
  hire_out_professionals(role: String!, description: String!, duration: String, salary: String, professionalId: ID!, clientRequestId: ID!): Status
  change_professional_password(new_password: String!, confirm_password: String!): Status
  createSuperAdmin(f_name: String!, l_name: String!, email: String!, password: String!): Status
  createPost(title: String!, content: String!, category: String!, file: Upload, slug: String!): Status
  updatePost(title: String, content: String, category: String, file: Upload, slug: String!): Status
  deletePost(slug: String!): Status
  adminDeletePost(slug: String!): Status
  createAdmin(f_name: String!, l_name: String!, email: String!, password: String!): Status
  adminChangePassword(current_password: String!, new_password: String!, confirm_password: String!): Status
  deleteAdmin(userId: ID!): Status
  unpublishPost(slug: String!): Status
  adminUnpublishPost(slug: String!): Status
}

type PageInfo {
  hasNextPage: Boolean!
  endCursor: DateTime!
}

type Portfolio {
  _id: ID!
  personal_website: String
  linkedin_profile: String
  github_profile: String
  dribble_profile: String
  behance: String
  facebook_profile: String
  instagram_profile: String
  twitter_profile: String
  professional: Professional
}

type Post {
  _id: ID!
  title: String!
  content: String!
  image: String
  category: String!
  creator: BlogUser!
  slug: String
  is_published: Boolean
  createdAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
}

type PostConnection {
  edges: [Post!]
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

type Professional {
  _id: ID!
  full_name: String!
  email: String
  phone_number: String!
  avatar: String
  address: String
  state: String
  city: String
  category: String
  about: String
  skill_set: [SkillSet!]
  bank_details: BankDetails
  employment_type: String
  preffered_work_style: String
  is_verified: Boolean
  has_been_vetted: Boolean
  has_been_hired: Boolean
  vetting_status: String
  experience_level: String
  salary_range: String
  work_history: [WorkHistory!]
  portfolio: Portfolio
  projects: [Project!]
  education: Education
  task: Task
  submitted_task: SubmittedTask
  is_professional: Boolean
  job: Job
  createdAt: DateTime
  updatedAt: DateTime
}

type ProfessionalConnection {
  edges: [Professional!]!
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

type Project {
  _id: ID!
  project_title: String
  project_description: String
  link_to_repository: String
  link_to_project: String
  technologies_used: [String]
  professional: Professional
}

type Query {
  client_login(email: String!, password: String!): Status
  client_profile: Client!
  view_single_request(clientRequestId: ID!): ClientRequest!
  view_personal_requests(cursor: String, limit: String): ClientRequestConnection!
  view_all_client_request(cursor: String, limit: String): ClientRequestConnection!
  view_all_clients(cursor: String, limit: String): ClientConnection!
  professional_login(email: String!, password: String!): Status
  professional_profile: Professional!
  super_admin_login(email: String!, password: String!): Status
  view_all_professionals(cursor: String, limit: Int): ProfessionalConnection!
  view_single_professional(professionalId: ID!): Professional!
  view_all_tasks(cursor: String, limit: String): TaskConnection!
  view_single_task(taskId: ID!): Task!
  view_single_submitted_task(submittedTaskId: ID!): SubmittedTask!
  view_all_submitted_task(cursor: String, limit: Int): SubmittedTaskConnection!
  view_vetted_professionals(cursor: String, limit: Int): ProfessionalConnection!
  view_hired_professionals(cursor: String, limit: Int): ProfessionalConnection!
  view_professionals_by_category(cursor: String, limit: Int, category: String!): ProfessionalConnection!
  view_single_job(jobId: ID!): Job!
  view_all_jobs(cursor: String, limit: String): JobConnection!
  view_all_meetings: [Calendly]
  userLogin(email: String!, password: String!): Status
  viewAllPosts(cursor: String, limit: Int): PostConnection!
  viewPublishedPost(cursor: String, limit: Int): PostConnection!
  viewPersonalPosts(cursor: String, limit: Int): PostConnection!
  viewAllUsers(cursor: String, limit: Int): BlogUserConnection!
  postWithId(slug: String!): Post!
  userProfile: BlogUser!
  viewPublishedPostByCategory(category: String!, cursor: String, limit: Int): PostConnection
}

type SkillSet {
  _id: ID
  skill: String!
  years_of_experience: String!
}

type Status {
  message: String
  value: Boolean
  client: Client!
  professional: Professional!
  admin: Admin!
  user: BlogUser!
}

type SubmittedTask {
  _id: ID!
  link_to_project: String
  link_to_repo: String
  turned_in_late: Boolean
  score: String
  task: Task
  professional: Professional
}

type SubmittedTaskConnection {
  edges: [SubmittedTask!]!
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

type Subscription {
  submitted_task(taskId: ID!): SubmittedTask
  suggested_professionals(clientRequestId: ID!): [Professional]
  new_job(clientRequestId: ID!): Job
  pick_prof_interview(clientRequestId: ID!): [Professional]
  pick_prof_likely_hire(clientRequestId: ID!): [Professional]
}

type Task {
  _id: ID!
  title: String
  instructions: String
  submission_date: DateTime
  submitted_task: [SubmittedTask!]
}

type TaskConnection {
  edges: [Task!]!
  pageInfo: PageInfo!
}

"""The `Upload` scalar type represents a file upload."""
scalar Upload

type WorkHistory {
  _id: ID!
  job_title: String
  job_description: String
  start_date: DateTime
  end_date: DateTime
  currently_working: Boolean
  name_of_company: String
  company_location: String
  employment_type: String
  professional: Professional
}
